meanings.definition: A person who quarrels or argues with others.
meanings.sent1: The quarrelers in the playground were shouting loudly at each other.
meanings.sent2: The two quarrelers couldn't agree on which game to play.
meanings.sent3: The quarrelers at the meeting kept interrupting each other, making it hard to reach a decision.
meanings.sent4: The quarrelers in the family were like two stubborn goats butting heads.
meanings.sent5: The image of the quarrelers arguing under the tree stuck in my mind.

meanings.sent1: The quarrelers gathered in the town square, ready to settle their dispute.
meanings.sent2: The group of quarrelers dispersed after realizing they had misunderstood each other.
meanings.sent3: The quarrelers in the play wore colorful costumes, adding a humorous touch to the scene.
meanings.sent4: The quarrelers in the painting seemed frozen in time, captured in their heated debate.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the quarrelers' voices echoed through the empty hallways.
